titleStmt.title: White-Hall in flames. A pindarick poem. : Occasion'd by the late burning of that royal palace. / By Mr. Tutchin.
titleStmt.author: Tutchin, John, 1661?-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
With: To the electors of the City of London. [London] : R. Clay, printer, [1835].
